decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Proposed Elevations (received on 08.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (1 of 8) (received on 07.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (2 of 8) (received on 07.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (3 of 8) (received on 08.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (4 of 8) (received on 08.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (5 of 8) (received on 08.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (6 of 8) (received on 07.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (7 of 8) (received on 07.11.2024); Proposed Window Details (8 of 8) (received on 08.11.2024)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per the submitted application form or approved drawings (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.19), policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) - sections 12 and 16.
description: Replacement of existing white timber single-glazed casement and sash windows with white timber double-glazed casement and sash windows on the front and rear elevations, and replacement of white timber single-glazed door with white timber double-glazed door on the first floor front balustrade.
